Reviews.Title: “Worked for Us.”
Reviews.Author: jaybark
Reviews.Content: five kings received lot negative reviews im argue experience definitely cramped bathroom shower ensuite wander stairs bathroom clean shower hot tv fine wifi included includes breakfast bacon eggs beans cereal fruit bread jam juice tea available 55 gbp price decent chose primarily location 5 minute walk family visiting maybe 15 minute walk tube connected main transport line stay simply location close family definitely check realize truly else

Reviews.Title: “Not an Hotel by any means”
Reviews.Author: Anthony N
Reviews.Content: hotel start basic wash basin toilet wasnt bathroom floor situated beds sink thats hotels bar food service neither hostel hostels provide selfservice cooking food purchased means particular venue allowed class hotel seen bad bbs miles equipped price 2 nights 2 people decent establishment lived own title hotel actual event am sorry didnt book tourist hostel city centre fraction price am struggling positives am close city centre tube bus routes lady greeted entry nice friendly

Reviews.Title: “Absolute let-down.”
Reviews.Author: ElleFleming
Reviews.Content: unfortunately stayed five kings hotel discovered trip advisor naive book reading reviews unclean uncomfortable smelled bathroom terrible musty damp smell whenever door shower avoided didnt lingering smell lady front desk rude didnt care didnt lifted bed sheets covered black hairs obviously cleaner avoided breakfast cant comment stop wouldnt recommend

HotelInfo.Name: Five Kings Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 59 Anson Road, London N7 0AR, England
